task.summary: Default task
OBB related stuff branch created
OBB related stuff branch created

OBB Related Stuff
Created an OBExpansionManager to encapsulate the mess made in MainActivity.
it is now capable to download, mount, copy and use the assets.

OBB Related Stuff
ExpansionManager is now fully independent. Gets the list from the server, compares to what it has and downloads what is required.
All assets are working using the internal assets first then looking for

Added OBUserPressedBackException and handling to prevent audi playing when exception was thrown.
added library for FileUtils in OBB related stuff
Bug Fixes to Talking Head

Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/onebillionchildren/XPRIZE-ob-android into OBB_related_stuff
# Conflicts: # .idea/modules.xml # app/src/main/java/org/onebillion/xprz/controls/OBControl.java # app/src/main/java/org/onebillion/xprz/controls/XPRZ_Presenter.java # app/src/main/java/org/onebillion/xprz/mainui/MainActivity.java # app/src/main/java/org/onebillion/xprz/mainui/OBSectionController.java # app/src/main/java/org/onebillion/xprz/mainui/XPRZ_SectionController.java # app/src/main/java/org/onebillion/xprz/mainui/x_lettersandsounds/X_LetterBox.java # app/src/main/java/org/onebillion/xprz/mainui/x_lettersandsounds/X_MakeSylWord.java # app/src/main/java/org/onebillion/xprz/mainui/x_reading/X_ReadingReadToMeNTx.java

Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/onebillionchildren/XPRIZE-ob-android into OBB_related_stuff
# Conflicts: # .idea/modules.xml # app/src/main/java/org/onebillion/xprz/controls/OBControl.java # app/src/main/java/org/onebillion/xprz/controls/XPRZ_Presenter.java # app/src/main/java/org/onebillion/xprz/mainui/MainActivity.java # app/src/main/java/org/onebillion/xprz/mainui/OBSectionController.java # app/src/main/java/org/onebillion/xprz/mainui/XPRZ_SectionController.java # app/src/main/java/org/onebillion/xprz/mainui/x_lettersandsounds/X_LetterBox.java # app/src/main/java/org/onebillion/xprz/mainui/x_lettersandsounds/X_MakeSylWord.java # app/src/main/java/org/onebillion/xprz/mainui/x_reading/X_ReadingReadToMeNTx.java

Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/onebillionchildren/XPRIZE-ob-android into OBB_related_stuff
# Conflicts: # .idea/modules.xml # app/src/main/java/org/onebillion/xprz/controls/OBControl.java # app/src/main/java/org/onebillion/xprz/controls/XPRZ_Presenter.java # app/src/main/java/org/onebillion/xprz/mainui/MainActivity.java # app/src/main/java/org/onebillion/xprz/mainui/OBSectionController.java # app/src/main/java/org/onebillion/xprz/mainui/XPRZ_SectionController.java # app/src/main/java/org/onebillion/xprz/mainui/x_lettersandsounds/X_LetterBox.java # app/src/main/java/org/onebillion/xprz/mainui/x_lettersandsounds/X_MakeSylWord.java # app/src/main/java/org/onebillion/xprz/mainui/x_reading/X_ReadingReadToMeNTx.java

Merge complete
Changes made to OBExpansionManager to handle null expansionURL in settings plist

Added X_PresenterTest to test the shouldTexturise Issue.
reflectInAncestor seems to be the culprit (the bounds need to be adjusted for the flip)
fixed issue with receiver listening in main activity

XPRZ_JudgeMenu added
Web page currently loading from ting (to be moved into the obb in the future) missing catch of links to call from master list added changes to ExpansionManager to suspend loading the mainviewcontroller while it's downloading stuff

Changes made to JudgeMenu
it now loads the units from the masterlist and returns correctly to the webpage
webpage is now stored in the internal storage and downloaded with the OBB
The video capabilities of the webpage had to be changed ( the plyr.js does not work correctly when being loaded from the internal storage, from the web it's OK)
Commented stuff for testing on shouldTexturise in OBGroup
Bug Fixes
Added 2 Sections: Add and TakeAway, Section 1 and 3
Counting 4 to 6 - Section 1 and 3 complete

Added Counting 7 to 10 - Section 3
Fixed an issue when requesting attributes from an OBControl (attributes returned null from not being set)
Now the function call attributes() checks if it's null, then sets it and returns it
Added Counting to 3 - Section 5

Added Numbers 1 to 10 - Section 4, 5 and 7
Fixed issue with opacity in OpenGL (previous solution is commented)

Added Patterns and Shapes - Section 3 and 4 Added Generic Complete Sequence Added Numbers 1 to 10 - Section 2 Changed Lines and Patterns - Section 3 to the Generic one
Fixed issue with multi touch ids

Added several maths sections
fixed the issue when getting the real height of the screen
graphicscale now being updated on renderer
Added functions to generic events to set to checking, save replayAudio and clear replay Audio to prevent RA spamming

OBBExpansionManager
Moved OBB password to settings.plist (will not work due to android bug)

Counting 4 to 6 - section 7 complete
added failsafes to mainactivity

Counting 7 to 10 - Section 7 complete
Some adjustments were made to XPRZ_Generic_Tracing for multiple paths and dashes

Counting 4 to 6 - Section 2 complete
Added generic to add and remove objects to scene

Counting 4 to 6 - Section 2 complete
Added generic to add and remove objects to scene
Bug Fixes (default language, dragging while changing scenes)

Make What you hear - Complete
Some bug fixes and logs to track missing images
Expansion Manager - fixed a bug that prevented app from continuing if no Wifi present

Expansion Manager - fixed some bugs
Added XPRZ_ListMenu for Harold Testing

MESSAGE.value: Bug Fixes to Talking Head

reflectInAncestor seems to be the culprit (the bounds need to be adjusted for the flip)

it now loads the units from the masterlist and returns correctly to the webpage

The video capabilities of the webpage had to be changed ( the plyr.js does not work correctly when being loaded from the internal storage, from the web it's OK)

Now the function call attributes() checks if it's null, then sets it and returns it

Added several maths sections
fixed the issue when getting the real height of the screen
graphicscale now being updated on renderer
